T02TD3715E:120a-1: tattva m'arg'a darsha na n'a ma /
T02TD3715E:120a-3: de nyid mthong ba'i lam zhes bya ba /
T02TD3715E:120a-4: spyan ras gzigs mgon de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3715E:120a-5: zhi zhing 'byor pa 'gro mgon thugs rje can //
T02TD3715E:120a-6: ri khrod zhabs la gus pas phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD3715E:120a-7: ston las rje yis byin brlabs rgyud kyi don //
T02TD3715E:120a-8: zhabs kyi rdul la ma reg chos 'di ni //
T02TD3715E:120a-9: dang brtson ldan dang bdag nyid brjed 'jigs pas //
T02TD3715E:120a-10: de nyid mthong ba'i lam 'di 'dir bshad bya //
T02TD3715E:120a-11: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di gsungs pa //
T02TD3715E:120a-12: gdul bya'i rim pas gzhag pa ste //
T02TD3715E:120a-13: dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya //
T02TD3715E:120a-14: de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid //
T02TD3715E:120a-15: de nas bye brag smra la bslab //
T02TD3715E:120a-16: mdo sde pa yang de nas bstan //
T02TD3715E:120a-17: rnal 'byor sbyod pa de bzhin te //
T02TD3715E:120a-18: de nas dbu ma pa yang bstan //
T02TD3715E:120a-19: sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas //
T02TD3715E:120a-20: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyin //
T02TD3715E:120a-21: dgyes rdor rgyud nas de bstan pas //
T02TD3715E:120a-22: gso sbyong gnas bcu bye brag dang //
T02TD3715E:120a-23: chung ba'i mdo sde nyan thos lam //
T02TD3715E:120a-24: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang //
T02TD3715E:120a-25: rnal 'byor spyod dang dbu ma'i chos //
T02TD3715E:120a-26: sngags gzhan dgyes rdor brjod pa nyid //
T02TD3715E:120a-27: bde ba'i lam dang 'bras bur bsngags //
T02TD3715E:120a-28: de la dang po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas pa dbang po rnon pos /
T02TD3715E:120a-29: mdo dang 'dul ba ltar yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:120a-30: 'dir rgyud ltar skal ba dang ldan pas bla ma mnyes pas bsgrub ste /
T02TD3715E:120a-32: thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD3715E:120a-33: skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs //
T02TD3715E:120a-34: zhes pas theg pa gsum la bslabs par bya ste /
T02TD3715E:120a-36: rang sangs rgyas gnyis la 'jug par 'dod pas dang po gso sbyong bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-0: @120b gnyis pa bslab pa bsrung ba dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-1: gsum pa chos la bslab pa'o //
T02TD3715E:120b-2: de yang byams pas zhus pa'i mdo las /
T02TD3715E:120b-3: dang po skyabs dang gso sbyong bya //
T02TD3715E:120b-4: gnyis pa bslab pa'i rim pa bzhin //
T02TD3715E:120b-5: gsum pa chos dag de la bstan //
T02TD3715E:120b-9: lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-16: shes pa dag pa'i mkhan po dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-18: sbyor ba ni lus gus pa dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-19: ngag 'jam pas brjod pa dang yid chos la dag pa dang gsum mo //
T02TD3715E:120b-20: rten mchog tu gyur pa ni dkon mchog go //
T02TD3715E:120b-21: rten la mchod pa ni ci 'byor pa'i mchod pas lus dubs ba'o //
T02TD3715E:120b-22: dus ni 'di nas zhes pa dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-24: yon tan ni snong gyi sdig pa thams cad 'byang zhing phyi ma'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa bde ba'o //
T02TD3715E:120b-25: mi nyams par bya ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:120b-26: sangs rgyas la skyabs nas 'jig rten pa'i lha spangs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-27: chos la skyabs nas rog mi gcog pa dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-28: dge 'dun la skyabs nas mu stegs dang mi 'grogs pa'o //
T02TD3715E:120b-29: bslab pa bsrung ba la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:120b-30: rten dang bslab pa dngos so //
T02TD3715E:120b-35: g/ zhan las skye ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:120b-36: mkhan po dang slob dpon te /
T02TD3715E:120b-37: dang po bar chad med pas tshul khrims thob pa dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-38: nus pa dang ldan pas sdom pa la gnas pa dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-39: bdag dang gzhan gyi nyes pa 'chos dgos pas mkhas pa ste /
T02TD3715E:120b-40: de gsum dang ldan pa las slab pa skye'o //
T02TD3715E:120b-41: rang las skye ba la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:120b-44: 'gro ba khyad par 'phags pa ni mi tsam ma yin te /
T02TD3715E:120b-45: gling khyad par du 'phags pa'i gling 'di tsam yin te /
T02TD3715E:120b-46: rigs khyad par du 'phags pa rgyal rigs dang /
T02TD3715E:120b-50: gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa skyes pa dang enbud med tsam yin te /
T02TD3715E:120b-51: lus khyad par 'phags pa dbang po tshang ba tsam gyis mi chog ste /
T02TD3715E:121a-0: shes pa dang sems khyad par du 'phags pa rgan @121a * //
T02TD3715E:121a-1: gzhon spangs nas lus dar ba'o //
T02TD3715E:121a-2: bye brag spyi dang ldan pa des nam blangs pa'i dus der skye'o //
T02TD3715E:121a-3: gnyi ga las skye ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:121a-4: mkhan slob la the tshom med pa dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-5: chos dang chos kyi yon tan la the tshom med pa dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-6: bslab pa bsrungs pa dang thob par the tshom med pas skye'o //
T02TD3715E:121a-7: bslab pa dngos la brgyad de /
T02TD3715E:121a-8: rten gyi khyad par gyis bslab pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-9: bslab par bya ba'i ngo bo dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-13: dus ma nges par bslab pa dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-16: bslab pa'i rim pa la so so thar pa rigs bdun gyi rim pas bslab pa ste /
T02TD3715E:121a-17: sde pa'i 'dod pa mi mthun te /
T02TD3715E:121a-19: dge bsnyen la bzhi ste lnga dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-21: dge slong dang bdun gyis bslab pa'o //
T02TD3715E:121a-22: ngo bo la gnyis te spyi dang bye brag go //
T02TD3715E:121a-23: spyi la yang gnyis te rtsa ba'am rang bzhin gyi sdig pa sdom pa dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-24: yan lag gam bcas pa'i sdom pa'o //
T02TD3715E:121a-25: bye brag ni bsnyen gnas la rtsa ba bzhi ste brgyad do //
T02TD3715E:121a-26: sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen la srog mi gcod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-27: rtsa ba gzhan gang rung cig / phal cher bsrung ba la rtsa ba gsum /
T02TD3715E:121a-28: yongs su rdzogs pa la rtsa ba gsum dang 'dod log bsrung /
T02TD3715E:121a-29: tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen ni rtsa ba bzhi dang chang bsrung ba'o //
T02TD3715E:121a-30: dge tshul gyis rtsa ba bzhi yan lag bdun /
T02TD3715E:121a-31: chang dang glu gar rtse 'jo dang //
T02TD3715E:121a-32: rgyan dang kha dog 'chang ba dang //
T02TD3715E:121a-33: mal stan chen po gser dngul gyi khri dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-34: khri stan mthon po khru gang pa yan chad spang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-37: mkhan po las thob pa'i rtags gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:121a-38: khyim pa'i rtags gtsug phud dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-40: rab tu byung ba'i rtags skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos dur smrig gon pa'o //
T02TD3715E:121a-41: phyi rol mu stegs pa'i rtags stod gos g-yas la 'gel ba dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-42: smad gos dkris pa spangs nas nang ba sangs rgyas pa'i rtags stod gos g-yon du 'gel ba dang /
T02TD3715E:121a-43: smad gos che bas zur du spung ba'o //
T02TD3715E:121b-0: mi dge ba 'jig rten pa'i rtags de dag spangs nas dge ba dge 'dun gyi @121b rtags gseg shang dang lhung bzed gri khab la sogs pa mkho ba'i rdzas bzung ba'o //
T02TD3715E:121b-1: dge slong gis shes rab can dang /
T02TD3715E:121b-2: dngos kyi rtsa ba bzhi dang /
T02TD3715E:121b-3: khu ba phyung ba la sogs pa lhag ma bcu gsum dben pa dang /
T02TD3715E:121b-4: skyabs ma nges pa gnyis dang 'chang ba 'bral ba la sogs spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu dang /
T02TD3715E:121b-6: grong du nyal ba la sogs pa so sor bshags pa bzhi dang /
T02TD3715E:121b-7: sham thabs la sogs pa bslab par bya ba brgyad cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD3715E:121b-8: mngon sum du nga rgyal mi bya ba la sogs pa te nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum bka' lung nas shes par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:121b-9: 'dir 'og nas ston pa'i lus ngag yid kyis mi bya ba dang bya ba rnams so //
T02TD3715E:121b-10: de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu sbyin //
T02TD3715E:121b-11: zhes pas mi dge ba bcu spangs la dge ba bcu bsten pa'o //
T02TD3715E:121b-12: nyes pa'i tshad la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:121b-13: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi'o //
T02TD3715E:121b-15: rtsa ba dang 'dra bar sbyor ba dang /
T02TD3715E:121b-16: dngos dang mjug tshang na ltung ba chen pos nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-17: dngos mjug gnyis byung na ltung ba sbom po ste nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-18: sbyor ba dang dngos byung na chung dun te nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-19: sbyor ba dang mjug byung na ltung ba phra mo ste nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-20: re re byung na ltung byed de nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-21: lhag ma dang ma nges pa la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams la yang lnga ste /
T02TD3715E:121b-23: dngos dang mjug rdzogs na nyes pa chen po ste nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-24: dngos mjug gnyis byung na nyes pa spom po ste nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-25: sbyor ba dang dngos byung na nyes pa chung du na te nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-26: sbyor ba dang mjug gnyis byung na nyes pa phra mo ste nyams /
T02TD3715E:121b-27: re re byung na nyes pa med do //
T02TD3715E:121b-28: bcos pa'i thabs la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:121b-30: thabs la bcu gcig ste rtsa ba dang yan lag gnyis yan chad dam /
T02TD3715E:121b-31: bzhi man chad byung na 'gyod pas lan gsum du bskyar zhing blang /
T02TD3715E:121b-32: rtsa ba'i sbom po byung na sngon bzhin du blang /
T02TD3715E:121b-33: chung dun byung na slob dpon las de nyid blang /
T02TD3715E:121b-34: phra mo byung na slob dpon la bshags pas thub /
T02TD3715E:121b-35: ltung byed byung na 'gyod pa dang bsdams sems kyis thub /
T02TD3715E:121b-36: nyes pa chen po byung ba spon bzhin blang /
T02TD3715E:121b-37: nyes pa sbom po slob dpon las blang /
T02TD3715E:121b-38: nyes pa chung dun slob dpon la bshags /
T02TD3715E:122a-0: nyes pa phra mo 'gyod pa dang bsdams sems kyis thub @122a * //
T02TD3715E:122a-1: nyes med phyis ma byas pas thub /
T02TD3715E:122a-3: rtsa ba dang yan lag ltar kun btang sems kyis btang na blang du med /
T02TD3715E:122a-4: rgas pa dang na ba dang gzhan gyi dbang la nyes pa med /
T02TD3715E:122a-6: bsnyen gnas kyi skabs dang ldan te /
T02TD3715E:122a-7: nyin skabs med na zla gcig gam phyed dam brgyad kyi dus de'o //
T02TD3715E:122a-8: dge bsnyen skabs dang ldan na thun gnyis pa la blang /
T02TD3715E:122a-9: skabs med na zhag lnga la blang /
T02TD3715E:122a-10: dge tshul skabs dang ldan na zhag lnga tshun chad la blang /
T02TD3715E:122a-11: mi ldan na zla ba gcig tshun chad na blang /
T02TD3715E:122a-12: dge slong skabs dang ldan na de nyid nas zhag bcu mi ldan na zla ba bdun tshun chad /
T02TD3715E:122a-13: nges bskyed pa dus de la rtsa ba dang /
T02TD3715E:122a-15: thabs des bcos pas thar pa thob ste /
T02TD3715E:122a-16: sgrung gi dpe re re bstan pa'o //
T02TD3715E:122a-17: de yang srog gcad pa las thar pa /
T02TD3715E:122a-18: dge slong zla ba'i 'od bya ba rigs bram ze yin pas /
T02TD3715E:122a-19: lo nyi shu rtsa gcig nas bzhi bcu'i bar nyi shur sngom pa bsrungs te /
T02TD3715E:122a-20: bzhi bcu lon nas pha kun du 'khor zhes bya bas snyan ngag yod pas rgyal po'i pho brang du snyan ngag bton pas /
T02TD3715E:122a-21: rgyal po gzugs can snying po shin tu dga' nas /
T02TD3715E:122a-22: go la bdun dang bcas pa byin nas bram ze gzhan cig gis gcig lam du khyer bas khros nas 'thabs pas kun du 'khor ba gsod do //
T02TD3715E:122a-23: bu dge slong sems 'khrugs te sbyor ba gsang bas las kyi spu gri khyer te /
T02TD3715E:122a-24: bram ze khrus byed sar bgugs te spu gri mngad nas bdar ba dang bram bre khrus las byung ba dang spu gris ske bcad de bsad do //
T02TD3715E:122a-25: mjug 'gyod pa med par dga' bar gyur te /
T02TD3715E:122a-26: ro yang gar dgar gzhag go //
T02TD3715E:122a-27: der kun gyis ro mthong nas 'di sus bsad snyam nas ngas pha'i mi shar bsad ces bsgrags so //
T02TD3715E:122a-28: der kun gyis kyang dpyas par gyur /
T02TD3715E:122a-30: yul der nad 'go ba byung ste /
T02TD3715E:122a-32: dka' thub med pa de yang na ba dang nad drag pos gzir bas shin tu 'gyod pa'i sems skyes te /
T02TD3715E:122a-33: lung nas sangs rgyas 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa la gong gi nyes pa rnams zhus pas sangs rgyas kyis gnad nas bslab pa bskyar te /
T02TD3715E:122a-34: dge slong dri ma dang bral bar gyur te ma ltung ngo //
T02TD3715E:122b-0: yul yangs pa can gyi grong na rje'u'i @122b rigs dge slong rin chen srung zhes bya ba cig yod pa la bsod snyoms la phyin nas khyim bdag gi mdzod mthong ste /
T02TD3715E:122b-1: lha khang gi logs su sbyor ba la dong brkos te gnas de nas ma ga dh'ara sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gro zhes dge 'dun la bsgrags nas song ste /
T02TD3715E:122b-2: de nub nam phyed na bang mdzod phug ste /
T02TD3715E:122b-5: gser dngul rus nas da ci'i dong dus pas te /
T02TD3715E:122b-6: mjug 'gyod pa med par dga' bar gyur ro //
T02TD3715E:122b-7: de longs spyod spyod pa las nub mo rkun po rkun 'phyan gzhan dang phrad nas nor khyer ro //
T02TD3715E:122b-8: lus gtag pa las shin tu 'gyod nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin te /
T02TD3715E:122b-9: gong gi nyes pa bshags nas sdom pa blangs te sangs rgyas kyis gnang nas dge slong rin chen 'byung gnas su gyur te ltung ba med do //
T02TD3715E:122b-10: grong khyer ser skyar dge slong shes grags kyis bsod snyoms byed pa las /
T02TD3715E:122b-11: re zhig na smad 'tshong ba 'byor pa rnyed bya ba'i sgor phyin te bslangs nas yon byin pas /
T02TD3715E:122b-12: smad 'tshong ma de shin tu legs par mthong ste /
T02TD3715E:122b-13: chags pa'i sems kyis sbyor ba slar log nas ka bya ri'i ras g-yar nas gyon te /
T02TD3715E:122b-14: 'gron bu ka ho na cig khyer nas srod la phyin te nga nyon byas pa las yar shog zer te phyin nas chags pa skye ba'i thabs sna tshogs byas dngos su nyon mongs pa la zhen nas bsrubs te khu ba phyung ngo //
T02TD3715E:122b-15: mjug bde bar tshor nas phyis kyang phrad do //
T02TD3715E:122b-16: ring zhig na ro mdze byung ste sdug bsngal bar gyur nas 'gyod de sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin nas sa la 'gyel te nyes pa rnams bshags nas bslab pa bskyar te ;
T02TD3715E:122b-17: dge slong zhi ba'i ye shes su gyur te ltung ba med do //
T02TD3715E:122b-18: rgyal byed kyi tshol du dge slong byang chub 'byung gnas su grags pa rgyal rigs su gyur pa cig byung bas dad pa shin tu che nas khras pa nar phyin pas spyan ras gzigs mthong nas yul de la kha ras pa na zhes btags so //
T02TD3715E:122b-19: slar log nas ma ga dh'ar phyin te /
T02TD3715E:122b-20: bstan bcos mang po byas nas de nas nga la sangs rgyas mang pos bstan zhes bsgrags pas /
T02TD3715E:122b-21: slob ma mang po yod pa las /
T02TD3715E:122b-22: sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen nas ma btang ba las nor sa 'og tu sbas nas phyin pa dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-0: sgyu ma byas pa'i sbyor ba mang po @123a * //
T02TD3715E:123a-1: byas nas chos 'chad pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-2: dngos su kun bsrubs ba mang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-3: mjug 'gyod pa med par dga' bas longs spyod spyod pa la rgyal po'i chad pa byung la khad pa dang tshor nas shin tu 'gyod pa skyes te /
T02TD3715E:123a-4: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin te nyes pa kun bshags te slar bslab pa gsos nas dge slong rdo rje snying por gyur te ltung ba med do //
T02TD3715E:123a-5: gzhan yang 'dul ba dang mdo nas 'gyod de /
T02TD3715E:123a-6: slar gsos pas thar pa mang po dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-7: gtan gyi the tshom med par phyir bcos so //
T02TD3715E:123a-8: yan lag gi nyes pa tsho yang bcos pas yang bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-9: chang rtsab ltar shes par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-10: 'dir theg pa chen po dang yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-11: dus ma nges pa la nyin gcig gam zhag gcig gam zhag bdun nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-12: yon tan la shes rab can gyis re re'i bye brag mdor blta'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-13: 'dir spyi tsam bstan pa ni dge bsnyen la sogs kyi gzhi mi las thob pa dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-14: lam rten dang ldan nas bsrung ba /
T02TD3715E:123a-15: 'bras bu dgra bcom pa thob pa'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-16: dge slong gi las la dge slong gi mdo dang 'dul bar blta'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-21: yon tan che ba la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:123a-22: bdud kyis bar mi chod cing lam nye ba dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-24: la ma nye ba la yang gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:123a-25: sangs rgyas la skyabs pas 'jig rten pa'i lha spangs pas /
T02TD3715E:123a-26: phyi mar dga' ldan du byams pa dang mjal lo //
T02TD3715E:123a-27: chos la skyabs pas srog gcod pa spangs pas byams pa las chos nyan pa dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-28: dge 'dun la skyabs te mu stegs dang ma 'grogs pas byams pa'i 'khor gyi dge 'dun dang 'grogs pa'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-30: so sor thar pa'i bslab pa rigs bdun rdzogs pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas su gyur pa dang /
T02TD3715E:123a-31: lus ngag yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos spyad pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas pas chos ston pa'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-32: dben par gcig pu bsten pas bdag sangs rgyas nas dge 'dun gyi 'khor phyug pa'o //
T02TD3715E:123a-33: dus skye ba bdun na dgra bcom pa thob nges so //
T02TD3715E:123b-0: yon tan nges pa @123b la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:123b-2: rgyu skye ba bdun du rten khyad par du 'phags pa drug dang ldan nges la 'bras bu lhag bcas dang lhag med gnyis mthong nges pa'o //
T02TD3715E:123b-3: thob pa'i dus la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:123b-8: gong gi dpang po la sogs pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba'i sbyor ba bdun pa dang /
T02TD3715E:123b-10: dngos la slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3715E:123b-11: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas /
T02TD3715E:123b-12: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3715E:123b-13: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog / phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3715E:123b-14: tshogs rnams kyi mchog / phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum bskyar ro //
T02TD3715E:123b-15: de la yang dbang po dang /
T02TD3715E:123b-20: dgos pa shugs kyis bstan pa ste drug go //
T02TD3715E:123b-21: blang ba dngos la skyabs pa'i yon tan shes pa sa blang ba las so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i rigs bdun te /
T02TD3715E:123b-22: bsnyen gnas blang ba la rang bzo min pa dang /
T02TD3715E:123b-23: blang ba gnyis rang bzo min pa la yang dpang po la sogs pa drug ste /
T02TD3715E:123b-25: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas /
T02TD3715E:123b-26: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po //
T02TD3715E:123b-28: rjes su bgyid do zhes lan gsum bskyar ro //
T02TD3715E:123b-29: blang ba la yang dpang po la sogs pa drug ste /
T02TD3715E:123b-31: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid dam /
T02TD3715E:123b-32: lo'am zla ba sngon du bstan pa ltar ro //
T02TD3715E:123b-33: zla ba byung ngo cog gi ngo la stong ngam /
T02TD3715E:123b-34: nya'am brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas srung bar 'tshal bas de'i nyin par dang mtshan mo rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD3715E:123b-35: de bzhin du gcig gam gnyis sam gsum bsrung ba la rtsa ba nas re rer gsum mam yan lag tu bcas par /
T02TD3715E:124a-1: bas dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zla ba byung ngo cog gi ngo la /
T02TD3715E:124a-2: nya'i bsnyen gnas bsrung bar 'tshal bas /
T02TD3715E:124a-3: de'i nyin par dang mtshan mo rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-4: rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-5: rtsa ba gsum po mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-6: rtsa ba bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-7: yan lag gi dang po 'bru'i chang dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-10: yan lag gnyis pa glu gar rtsed 'jo rgyan kha dog 'chang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-11: yan lag gsum pa mal stan dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-13: yan lag bzhi pa phyi dro'i kha zas spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do //
T02TD3715E:124a-14: sngon gyi dgra bcom pa kun gyi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo //
T02TD3715E:124a-19: bsnyen gnas kyi bslab pa la 'thob po //
T02TD3715E:124a-20: slob dpon gyis bsnyen gnas su gzung du gsol lo //
T02TD3715E:124a-21: zhes lan gsum brjod nas phyag lan gsum bya'o //
T02TD3715E:124a-22: thob pa dngos la drug ste /
T02TD3715E:124a-23: skyabs 'gro sbyor ba sngon du song ba dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-25: slob dpon la the tshom ma zos pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-26: chos la the tshom ma zos pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-27: ma thob par the tshom ma zos pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124a-28: dus de nyid du thob pa'o //
T02TD3715E:124a-29: dge bsnyen la sogs pa drug po yang /
T02TD3715E:124a-30: don drug po de dang ldan nas thob ste /
T02TD3715E:124a-31: 'dra bar shes par gyis shig / dge bsnyen gyi skyabs 'gro yang gong ltar blang ba /
T02TD3715E:124a-33: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po //
T02TD3715E:124a-35: rjes su bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod de /
T02TD3715E:124a-36: dang po la sogs pa drug gong bzhin ldan no //
T02TD3715E:124a-38: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen gyid pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa spangs nas srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lo zla ba'i grangs kyis gsum du brjod do //
T02TD3715E:124b-0: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen bgyid pas rtsa @124b ba gnyis ma byin par len pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do //
T02TD3715E:124b-1: sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po //
T02TD3715E:124b-6: sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur /
T02TD3715E:124b-7: slob dpon gyis sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD3715E:124b-9: phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur pa skyabs 'gro gong bzhin song ba dang /
T02TD3715E:124b-10: rang bzo med pa'i bslang ba yang 'dra bas song nas slob dpon dgongs su gsol //
T02TD3715E:124b-11: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen bgyid pas rtsa ba dang po srog gcod pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lan gsum bzla'o //
T02TD3715E:124b-12: de bzhin du rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124b-13: gsum pa 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod nas /
T02TD3715E:124b-14: sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po //
T02TD3715E:124b-19: khal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur ro //
T02TD3715E:124b-20: slob dpon gyis khal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes brjod la phyag lan gsum bya'o //
T02TD3715E:124b-21: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen la gzhan sngon du song bas /
T02TD3715E:124b-23: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen la gnas pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124b-24: gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124b-25: gsum pa 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
T02TD3715E:124b-26: bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes re re la gsum gsum brjod la /
T02TD3715E:124b-27: sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes su slob bo //
T02TD3715E:124b-32: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro //
T02TD3715E:124b-33: slob dpon gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes bya'o //
T02TD3715E:124b-34: tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen gyis kyang gzhan sngon du song bas /
T02TD3715E:125a-2: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen la gnas pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-3: rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-4: gsum pa mi tshangs par sbyod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-5: bzhin pa brdzun du smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-6: yan lag gi dang po myos pa'i chang dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-8: 'bru'i chang dag spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid pa lags so zhes re re la gsum gsum brjod na /
T02TD3715E:125a-9: sdon gyi dgra bcom pa rnam skyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po //
T02TD3715E:125a-14: tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro //
T02TD3715E:125a-15: slob dpon gyis tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol //
T02TD3715E:125a-16: dge tshul gyis kyang gzhin gong ltar mkhan po slob dpon dad pa'i dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3715E:125a-17: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge tshul la gnas pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-18: gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-19: gsum pa mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-20: bzhi pa bardzun du smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-21: yan lag dang po 'bru'i chang dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-22: bcos pa'i chang dang myos par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-23: yan lag gnyis pa glu gar rtse 'jo dang //
T02TD3715E:125a-24: yan lag gsum pa rgyan dang kha dog 'chang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-25: bzhi pa mal stan mthon po dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-26: lnga pa khri stan chen po dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-27: drug pa phyi dro'i kha zas dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-28: bdun pa gser dngul 'chang ba spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid lags so zhes re re la gsum gsum brjod do //
T02TD3715E:125a-29: sngon gyi zhes pa la sogs pa gong ltar brjod do //
T02TD3715E:125a-30: dge slong dngos kyi las kyi cho gas blang /
T02TD3715E:125a-31: 'dir skyabs dang legs par brjod pa gong ltar gsum brjod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-32: gong gi rtsa ba bzhi dang /
T02TD3715E:125a-33: lhag ma dang ma nges pa gnyis dang ;
T02TD3715E:125a-34: spang ba'i ltung byed la sogs pa las ldog par brjod do //
T02TD3715E:125a-35: gso sbyong zhes bya ba lo'am /
T02TD3715E:125a-36: zla ba'am nya stong gso zhing sbyong ba'o //
T02TD3715E:125a-37: nyams pa yang bcos su yod pas kyang gso sbyong ngo //
T02TD3715E:125a-38: dus ma nges pa zla ba 'am lo tsam srung ba la yang gso zhing sbyong ba legs so //
T02TD3715E:125b-0: 'dir @125b 'og gi theg pa gsum 'dod pas dus snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du brjod cing khas blang do //
T02TD3715E:125b-1: sems bskyed pa'i tshe 'og gi gdams ngag gis byang chub snying por shes par bstan par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:125b-2: mngon nas kyang nyes pa skyes bas blta'o //
T02TD3715E:125b-3: gsum pa chos la bslab pa la bzhi ste /
T02TD3715E:125b-9: bsnyen gnas pas spyad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-10: dge bsnyen gyis spyad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-11: dge tshul bas spyad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-13: de la bsnyen gnas pas spyad pa ni kun du bzang po'i mdo las bsnyen gnas pa'i gang zag gis /
T02TD3715E:125b-14: de dus lus ngag yid kyis sgrim zhes pas lus kyis khrus dang phyag bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-17: yid kyis nyes pa shes pas bslab pa bsrung ba'i sems dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-18: yon tan shes pas yi dam gyi lha dran pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-19: lus ngag gis dge ba byas pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-20: bsrung ba'i nyi ma yid la bya ba'o //
T02TD3715E:125b-21: dge bsnyen gyis spyad pa la byams pas zhus pa'i mdo nas /
T02TD3715E:125b-22: dge bsnyen dad dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD3715E:125b-23: las min spang zhing dge bcu bsnyen //
T02TD3715E:125b-25: bya phyag gso ba la sogs pa bcu mya ngan las 'das pa'i nang nas bstan pa ltar spang ba'o //
T02TD3715E:125b-26: dge ba bcu ni kun dga' bos zhus pa'i mdo nas bstan pa ltar sbyad de /
T02TD3715E:125b-28: 'byor pa sbyin par gtang ba dag /
T02TD3715E:125b-31: sku gzugs dang lha khang la sog pa la na bzang dbul ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-35: snying po dang bsod pa bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-36: zhig pa gso ba dang sku dkar byug pa dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-37: nya mo btsun pa'i dge ba bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:125b-38: 'os pa'i kha ma dang drin can la rim gro bya ba'o //
T02TD3715E:125b-39: dge tshul gyis spyad pa la dge tshul dngos kyi 'dul bar blta'o //
T02TD3715E:125b-41: nam gyi cha smad mal langs nas //
T02TD3715E:125b-42: nam langs btshar du kha ton bya //
T02TD3715E:125b-43: gdong dang so yi dri bkrus la //
T02TD3715E:125b-44: de bzhin gshegs la gus phyag 'tshal //
T02TD3715E:126a-0: zhes pas lus ngang yid kyis bya ba ste lus kyi nyes pa 'phel bar mi bya ba la @126a * //
T02TD3715E:126a-2: nyin par 'jig rten pa ma dad pa spad ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-3: mtshan mo phyi sgo phyin chad du mi nyal ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-4: 'gro ba'i tshe bslab pa dran pas bag ma ltar 'gro ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-5: za ba dang 'dug pa dag bag med par mi bya'o //
T02TD3715E:126a-6: dge ba 'phel bas tho rangs srod tsog tsog po dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-7: khrus dang rten la phyag dus dang skabs su bya'o //
T02TD3715E:126a-8: ngag gis mi smra ba drug ste /
T02TD3715E:126a-12: phyar ka mi gtang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-13: rta gad mi bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-14: gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun mang po'i gseb tu gcam bskyung ba'o //
T02TD3715E:126a-15: ngag gis brjod par bya ba kha don dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-20: dang bas chos zhu ba dang drug go //
T02TD3715E:126a-21: yid la gnyis kyi nyes pa spang ba la yang gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:126a-24: dge 'dun gyi dkor la gnod sems dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-26: bslab pa nyams pa'i nyes pa dran par byas la bslab pa bsrung ba'o //
T02TD3715E:126a-27: yon tan dran pas bsam pa lnga ste /
T02TD3715E:126a-28: lus ngag gi dge ba'i yon tan dran par bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-29: 'khor ba sdug bsngal bar shes par bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-30: byas pa mi rtag pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-31: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-32: stong pa bdag med par shes par bya ba'o //
T02TD3715E:126a-33: dge slong gi spyad pa la dge slong dngos dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-34: shes rab can gyis 'drul bar yang blta'o //
T02TD3715E:126a-35: 'dir lha'i dbang pos zhus pa'i mdo las /
T02TD3715E:126a-36: dge slong rnams kyis bya ba ni //
T02TD3715E:126a-37: mi dge bcu spang dge bcu bsgrub //
T02TD3715E:126a-38: de yang lus ngag yid kyis te //
T02TD3715E:126a-39: ma yengs spyong lam rnam bzhir sbyod //
T02TD3715E:126a-42: de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu po zhes pas /
T02TD3715E:126a-44: de yang mi dge ba bcu mi 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD3715E:126a-45: dga' bos zhus pa de nyid las mi dge ba bcu 'phel bas dge slong rnams nyes byed bcu spongs shig / bcu gang zhe na /
T02TD3715E:126a-46: srog gcod pa'i nyes byed ma bsams par dge slong rnams lus kyi bya ba byed pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-47: ma byin par len pa'i nyes byed gzhan gyi gzugs kyi yul la reg pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126a-48: mi changs par sbyod pa'i nyes byed bud med kyi yul lnga la spyod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-0: brdzun gyi nyes @126b byed ma bsams par smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-1: phra ma'i nyes byed mang bar smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-2: ngag 'khyal pa'i nyes byed bre mor smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-3: tshig rtsub mo'i nyes byed mi dga' bar smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-4: brnab sems kyi nyes byed bdag la dgos sems 'chang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-5: gnod sems kyi nyes byed gzhan la log par sbyod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:126b-6: log par lta ba'i nyes byed dngos po la chags pa rnams spongs shig ces bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD3715E:126b-7: mi dge bcu 'gags pas mi dge ba dang bral nas dge bcur 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD3715E:126b-8: de ni bslab pa'i gnas bcu zhes pa'o //
T02TD3715E:126b-9: de nas bye brag pa la bslab ces pa la yang de nyid nas /
T02TD3715E:126b-10: dge bcu rgyas phyir chos gnyis dang //
T02TD3715E:126b-11: spyod lam bzhi ru dge slong spyod //
T02TD3715E:126b-13: de yang chos gnyis po nyes pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-14: mi dge ba spyod lam rnam bzhis mi byed pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-15: yon tan dge ba 'phel ba spyod lam bzhis bya ba ste /
T02TD3715E:126b-17: dge slong byang chub sems ldan pas //
T02TD3715E:126b-18: rtag tu dben par bsdad par bya //
T02TD3715E:126b-19: sems kyis bdag gzhan don byed la //
T02TD3715E:126b-20: dge slong zhes ni ngas brjod do //
T02TD3715E:126b-21: zhes pas de yang sems gnyis bskyed nas theg pa gsum dang ldan zhing dben par gnas nas mi dge ba mi 'byung zhing dge ba 'phel te /
T02TD3715E:126b-22: gal te gzhan don sems kyis byed kyang dngos su mi nus pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-23: dben par mi gnas pas 'di ltar bya ste /
T02TD3715E:126b-24: spyod lam bzhis mi bya ba la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:126b-25: yid kyis dran pa lus kyis mi bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-26: ngag gis mi bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-27: lus kyis gzhi la sdod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-31: sdod pa la nyes pa 'byung ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-32: nyes pa chen po 'byung nas bsdad pa gnyis kyi nyes pa 'byung bas mi bsdad pa la bcu gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:126b-42: bu chung la rtse ba dang /
T02TD3715E:126b-43: 'jig rten dang bud med nang du sdod pa spang ba'o //
T02TD3715E:126b-44: nyes pa chen po 'byung bas mi bsdad pa la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:127a-4: bsdad sa min pa la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:127a-5: g-yas dang mdun du mi bsdad pa'o //
T02TD3715E:127a-6: 'gro ba la gnyis kyi nyes pa 'byung bas mi 'gro ba la bcu bdun te /
T02TD3715E:127a-7: mu stegs dang 'grogs te mi 'gro / rgyug cing rgyug cing mi 'gro /
T02TD3715E:127a-8: mu stegs kyi nang du mi 'gro / sgyu ma mkhan dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro / de bzhin du tshong ba dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro / dmag dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro / shan pa dang smad 'tshong ma dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro / bud med dang mi 'grogs nang du mi 'gro //
T02TD3715E:127a-9: phyogs su lta ba dang yul yengs pas mi 'gro / gos med pa dang /
T02TD3715E:127a-11: gzhan yang rtsod pa'i sar mi 'gro ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127a-16: nyes pa chen po 'byung bas mi bya ba gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:127a-19: dngos sam grib ma la mi 'gom /
T02TD3715E:127a-20: g-yon bstan la mi 'gro / steng nas mi 'gro / mdun nas mi 'gro / rjes non pas mi 'gro ba'o //
T02TD3715E:127a-21: ngag la yid kyis zin par bya ste /
T02TD3715E:127a-22: mi smra ba la bzhi ste /
T02TD3715E:127a-23: sngod pa'i tshe mi smra ba la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:127a-24: nyes pa dang nyes pa chen po las mu stegs la sogs pa bden yang mi smra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127a-28: nyes pa chen po 'byung bas mi smra ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:127a-29: 'greng ste sngod pa la sogs pas chos mi bshad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:127a-30: mchod rten la sogs pa la rgyu 'bras la skur ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127a-32: brdzun sogs gong du bkag pa rnams kyang smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD3715E:127a-33: 'gro ba la yang de bzhin te /
T02TD3715E:127a-34: za ba dang nyal ba la yang de bzhin no //
T02TD3715E:127a-36: nyes pa chen po dag shes te smra ba'i tshod rig par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:127a-37: lus kyis zas za ba'i tshe na yang gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:127a-39: 'greng ba la sogs pa bcus mi bza' ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127a-44: 'gram pa g-yas g-yon spo ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-1: yang pa'i sar za ba spang ba'o //
T02TD3715E:127b-2: nyes pa chen po 'byung bas spang ba la lnga //
T02TD3715E:127b-3: dkon mchog la bsngos pa za ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-4: mkhan po dang slob dpon la dad pas bsngos pa za ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-5: pha dang ma la bsngos pa za ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-6: gtor ma dang byin gyis rlob pa za ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-7: rgyal po dang grong dpon la bsngos pa za ba spang ba'o //
T02TD3715E:127b-8: nyal ba'i tshe'i lus la yang gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:127b-13: dbang po lag pas gzung ba dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-14: nub tu mgo bstan pa dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-16: 'jig rten pa'i mi mang po nang dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-18: grogs med par mi nyal ba'o //
T02TD3715E:127b-19: nyes pa chen po 'byung bas mi nyal ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:127b-20: gong gi lha khang la sogs pa'i rten du 'os pa'i steng dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-22: rgyab bstan pas mi nyal ba'o //
T02TD3715E:127b-23: na'am sa ye ma rnyed dam /
T02TD3715E:127b-24: srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ram dbang med na /
T02TD3715E:127b-26: dang po pa yi chos rnams ni //
T02TD3715E:127b-27: bar chad med par shes byas la //
T02TD3715E:127b-28: gso sbyong bya zhing bslab pa bsrung //
T02TD3715E:127b-29: rim gyis rim gyis goms te bla //
T02TD3715E:127b-31: gso sbyong bya zhing skabs dang sbyar ro //
T02TD3715E:127b-32: bye brag kho na dbang du byas nas 'dod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-35: sdom pas rgan pa la phyag byed pa dang /
T02TD3715E:127b-36: lus ngag gi dge ba rang gi don du 'dod pa gnyis so //
T02TD3715E:127b-40: 'bras bu bskal pa gcig nas chos ston pa'i dus so //
T02TD3715E:127b-42: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
T02TD3715E:127b-43: theg pa gsum du dbyer med kyang //
T02TD3715E:127b-44: gtso bos theg pa gsum bstan pa //
T02TD3715E:127b-45: nga yi thabs la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD3715E:127b-46: zhes pas theg pa gsum la gnas par bya zhing /
T02TD3715E:127b-47: sdom pa gsum dang ldan par byas pas yon tan dang dge ba 'phel ba'i phyir sbyor lam bzhis sbyad par bya ba yang sdod pa la sogs pa thun bzhir bsgrub ste /
T02TD3715E:127b-48: snga dro'i thun la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:127b-49: ldang ba la sbyor ba dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-0: sbyor ba yid ngag lus gsum @128a * //
T02TD3715E:128a-2: yod sngon yang le lo dang gnyid kho na la brten nas 'di 'dra'o zhes bsams te nam smad ldang ngo //
T02TD3715E:128a-7: na mo lo ke shva r'a ya /
T02TD3715E:128a-9: zhes rang gi yi dam gyi lha bskul lo //
T02TD3715E:128a-10: lus dal nas tsog tsog tu ldang ngo //
T02TD3715E:128a-11: dngos lus legs par langs la stod gos dang smad gos bgo ba dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-12: ngag snying po sgra dang bcas pas sprul dang sems can bskrad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-13: yid dge ba bya ba'i phyir chos dran pa'o //
T02TD3715E:128a-14: mjug le lo dang the tshom med pa'o //
T02TD3715E:128a-15: khrus la yang sbyor ba dngos mjug gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:128a-16: sbyor ba bshang ba che chung dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-17: snabs lud sems can la gnod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-18: sa min sar mi 'dor zhing legs par byas pa dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-19: chu srog chags dang dri ma med pas snod bkang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-20: bkru sa yang mi gnod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-21: sa ma yin par bkru ba dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-22: chu byin gyis brlab pa chu snod de'i chu la aa dkar po bsams la //
T02TD3715E:128a-23: aa'i 'od kyis 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs sbyan drangs te /
T02TD3715E:128a-24: mdun na gsal ba'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad sbyan drangs te /
T02TD3715E:128a-25: sbyan ras gzigs lta bur gyur pas nam mkha' khengs pa phyag mtshan kun de'i mthus sngar gyi chus bkang nas 'o ma ltar bdud rtsi'i chur gyur par bsams te bkru'o //
T02TD3715E:128a-26: bkru ba dngos ni aom ma ni padme sva bh'a ba h'um /
T02TD3715E:128a-27: zhes brjod cing kha dang lag pa dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-29: yid kyis sgrib pa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-30: byin gyis brlabs pa chu dang ;
T02TD3715E:128a-31: sngags kyi nus pas dag par bsam mo //
T02TD3715E:128a-32: mjug mdun gyis sangs rgyas rnams gzhan don la slar gshegs par bsam mo //
T02TD3715E:128a-33: rang nyid pa dang sgrib pa dag pas dge ba byas par gnas par gnas par bam zhing don che bar bsam mo /
T02TD3715E:128a-34: chos sbyad pa la bsam gtan dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-37: 'byung bo la gtor ma gtang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:128a-39: bsam gtan la yang gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:128a-40: sbyor ba lus cog cog gam skyil krung du bsdang /
T02TD3715E:128a-42: yid aom gyi 'od kha dog lngas /
T02TD3715E:128a-43: dngos po sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ngo bor byas /
T02TD3715E:128b-0: aa:'i 'od @128b dkar pos sku'i ngo bo de sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang ldan par byas /
T02TD3715E:128b-1: h'um gi 'od nag po des sku gsung gi ngo bo de thugs dang ldan par byas te /
T02TD3715E:128b-2: thams cad mnyam por bsgrubs gnas dang bdag dang ting nge 'dzin dag ste bsrung bar yang de 'gyur ro //
T02TD3715E:128b-3: de nas bsam gtan dngos rtogs pa dang man ngag dang yid mos pa la thun dang nus tshad du gnas par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:128b-5: bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gtsug tor dang /
T02TD3715E:128b-6: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa gdon //
T02TD3715E:128b-7: sgrib pa bal zhing dge ba bsdu pa'i phyir ltung bshags gdon /
T02TD3715E:128b-8: dge brgyas bar bya ba'i phyir byams pa dang sbyan ras gzigs dang ;
T02TD3715E:128b-9: bzang sbyod kyi smon lam lam gdon /
T02TD3715E:128b-10: dge ba mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shes rab snying po gdon /
T02TD3715E:128b-11: bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brjod dang /
T02TD3715E:128b-12: mgon po nag po'i mdo gdon no //
T02TD3715E:128b-13: de yang gtsug tor rgyal ba'i mdo las /
T02TD3715E:128b-14: bgegs rnams gtsug tor rdo rjes 'joms //
T02TD3715E:128b-15: kun du dge ba zhus pa yis //
T02TD3715E:128b-16: sgrib sel bsong nams sdud pa dang //
T02TD3715E:128b-17: byams pa smon dang bzang por sbyod //
T02TD3715E:128b-18: dge ba rgyas phyir nga yis bskul //
T02TD3715E:128b-19: shes rab pha rol phyin de dag / de rnams kun gyi snying po brjod //
T02TD3715E:128b-20: bstan pa rgyas byed 'jam dpal dang //
T02TD3715E:128b-21: dal khas blangs mgon nag po //
T02TD3715E:128b-23: de la yang sbyor ba lta rnams mdun du gsal ba dang /
T02TD3715E:128b-24: dag pa dang gsal ba dang bar ma chod par gdon pa dngos dang /
T02TD3715E:128b-25: yon tan la the tshom mi za ba dngos so //
T02TD3715E:128b-26: rgyas par bshad pa'i sbyor ba dngos mjug kyang shes par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:128b-27: chu sbyin ni rten snod du gzhag ba'am /
T02TD3715E:128b-28: med na yang ngang yi dam gyi lha gang yin pa der bsgoms la /
T02TD3715E:128b-29: aom a'a:h'um brjod pas h'um gi 'od des snod kun stong par bsam /
T02TD3715E:128b-30: stong pa las pam las padma ser po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD3715E:128b-31: de'i lte ba la aa las zla ba rgyas pa 'od dang bcas pa /
T02TD3715E:128b-32: de'i steng du dzam ser 'od dang bcas pa /
T02TD3715E:128b-33: dzam de gyur pa las nor sbyin ser po padma dang zla ba'i steng du g-yas brkyang ba'i 'o ga na yid bzhin gyi nor bu mnan pa /
T02TD3715E:128b-34: g-yon bkum pa'i pus mo'i 'og na rin po che sna tshogs kyi bum pa mnan pa /
T02TD3715E:128b-35: mdog ser po gser bsregs pa 'dra ba /
T02TD3715E:128b-36: ral ba gyen du brdzes nas rin po che'i ze prog can /
T02TD3715E:129a-1: par snang mdzad ltar mdangs dang ldan pa /
T02TD3715E:129a-4: zhabs gdub rin po che sna tshogs kyis byas pa gcig bsgoms la /
T02TD3715E:129a-5: de'i thugs ka na padmo'i steng na zla ba /
T02TD3715E:129a-6: de'i steng na dzam ser po yong pa des rang bzhin gyi nor lha de nyid 'dra ba sbyan drangs te dngos sam yid kyis mchod sbyin phul la bdag gzhan gyi 'dod pa skongs shig ces brjod de /
T02TD3715E:129a-7: de la bcug la gnyis med du gyur pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i jam gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sbyan drangs te mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas dbang mnos rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3715E:129a-8: sbyor ba des nor sbyin bskyed nas chu snod chu dang bcas pa la sngon du bstan pa'i khrus kyi skabs ltar byin gyis brlabs la sbyor ba de dang ldan pas sbyin pa dngos g-yas pa'i sor mo las bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis sbyin pa //
T02TD3715E:129a-9: aom dzam bha la dza landra ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD3715E:129a-10: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad spyin no //
T02TD3715E:129a-11: mjug bdag gi 'dod pa skongs par gyis shig ces brjod la chu de gtsang sar bskyal lo //
T02TD3715E:129a-12: de yang sangs rgyas bya rgod phyang po'i ri la bzhugs pa la /
T02TD3715E:129a-13: lha sbyin gyis brag 'phangs pa la phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'phangs pas brag phyed mar chad pa las /
T02TD3715E:129a-14: phyed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mthe bong la bzhar phyed kyis nor sbyin gyi mgo bkas pas sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad bred pa la /
T02TD3715E:129a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas 'u cag gnyis la kho'i de tsam gyi lan chags pas mi dga' ma byed cig / khyod la ngas phan gdags so zhes brjod nas gong ltar bkrus pas sos te ;
T02TD3715E:129a-16: 'gro ba la phyin chad nor sbyin par byang chub tu sems bskyed nas phyir bas kyi gang zag chos la mos pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis chu sbyin zhing //
T02TD3715E:129a-17: nor sbyin gyis nor sbyin par sangs rgyas kyi sbyan sngar dam bcas pa'o //
T02TD3715E:129a-18: 'byung po la gtor ma sbyin pa la gtor snod gtsang mar zan dang chu gtsang mas bkang ba mdun du stegs la gzhag ste /
T02TD3715E:129a-19: rang yi dam gyi lhar gsal bas aom a'a:h'um brjod pas h'um gi 'od sngon pos stong par byas /
T02TD3715E:129a-20: a'a:pa'i 'od dkar pos snod bcud du bcas pa rgya che zhing zab pa'i bdud rtsir gyur te /
T02TD3715E:129b-0: aom gyam 'od lngas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bsam pa @129b dang /
T02TD3715E:129b-1: 'byung po dang yi dags bza' btung gis phongs pa thams cad bkug ste bdud rtsi la zad pa med cing ro dang ldan pa la yi dags dga' nas longs sbyod par bsam pa'o //
T02TD3715E:129b-2: btang ba dngos la lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo lnga las kyang bdud rtsi dkar me re re 'bab par bsams la /
T02TD3715E:129b-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te aom sam bta ra sam bha ra h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3715E:129b-6: g-yas pas se gol lan gsum brdabs la sbyin no //
T02TD3715E:129b-7: mjug gtsang sar bskyal ba dang /
T02TD3715E:129b-8: der tshogs pa'i 'byung po rnams 'grangs ngoms te chos la dad bar bsam mo //
T02TD3715E:129b-9: de yang sangs rgyas rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs pa la ma ga dh'ar khyim bdag phung po dge zhes bya bas sangs rgyas 'khro bcas sbyan drangs nas chos ston drangs te slar bshegs so /
T02TD3715E:129b-10: phyi de lo dus khyim bdag de ltogs par gyur te /
T02TD3715E:129b-11: sangs rgyas kyi sbyan sngar phyin te dris pa la /
T02TD3715E:129b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs la zhus zhes bstan nas /
T02TD3715E:129b-13: khyim bdag gis 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs la zhus pas //
T02TD3715E:129b-14: khyod kyis snga ma mchod pa'i yi dags dang 'byung po skal ba bcad pas nyes te /
T02TD3715E:129b-15: da 'id bzhin du yi dags sgo drung na yod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:129b-16: gzhan dag la yang gtor ma 'di ltar byin zhes gong gi de bstan bas de slar sngon bzhin 'byor pa dang ldan par gyur to //
T02TD3715E:129b-17: phyi rabs kyi gang zag chos la dad pa rnams kyang 'byung po 'i gtor ma la brtson pas yi dags la phan pa dang /
T02TD3715E:129b-18: bdag gi 'byor pa mi nyams pa'o //
T02TD3715E:129b-20: yid du 'ong pa'i sa la khru gang las mi chung ba'i gru bzhi la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD3715E:129b-21: sbyor ba chu gtsang ma dang me tog dang dris byug pa dang /
T02TD3715E:129b-23: zhes brjod cing sa byugs pas /
T02TD3715E:129b-24: rdo rje'i sa bzhir bsam pa dang /
T02TD3715E:129b-25: aom a'a:badzra re khe h'um zhes brjod la /
T02TD3715E:129b-26: re kh'a bskor bas rgya che ba'i gzhal yas su bsam pa dang /
T02TD3715E:129b-27: aom a'a:badzra mandal h'um zhes brjod la snyoms par byugs pas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byugs par bsams la /
T02TD3715E:130a-0: aom a'a:badzra re khe h'um zhes brjod de bsrung ba gzhan pas rdo rje'i srung @130a * //
T02TD3715E:130a-1: bas bgegs bskrad par bsam pa dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-3: dbul ba dngos la mandal la dbul ba dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-5: mandal la dbul ba ni me tog tshom bu dgu dbus dang shar gyi rim pas phyogs dang mtshams su bkod la skad cig gam rim gyis mtsho las padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa lte ba na zla ba'i gdan la lha so so'i dam tshig pa sa bon nam mngon byang lngas /
T02TD3715E:130a-7: de'i 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug cing bstim la bsgom ste /
T02TD3715E:130a-8: aom badzra pushpe a'a:h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02TD3715E:130a-9: aom badzra d'i pe a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3715E:130a-10: aom badzra gandhe a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3715E:130a-11: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3715E:130a-12: aom badzra gandha le a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3715E:130a-13: zhes brjod la gzugs la sogs pa dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-16: 'jig rten gyi dge ba la yi rang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-17: de'i dge ba bsngo ba dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-18: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-23: bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis /
T02TD3715E:130a-24: ab dru du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
T02TD3715E:130a-25: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba sgrol //
T02TD3715E:130a-26: zhes smon lam gdab pa ni mjug go //
T02TD3715E:130a-27: mandal dbul ba la yang gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:130a-30: sbyi la dbul ba ni ji ltar mdzes par bya ste /
T02TD3715E:130a-31: dngos sam yid gyis dngos po gzugs la sogs pa lus ngang bcas pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-32: mjug bdun rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD3715E:130a-33: smon lam gong ltar gdab bo //
T02TD3715E:130a-34: bla ma la dbul ba ni /
T02TD3715E:130a-35: aom ham ma h'a me re be na ma:/
T02TD3715E:130a-36: zhes brjod pas mandal gyi dkyil du bzhag la ri rab tu bsam /
T02TD3715E:130a-37: aom yam p'u rba bi de ha ya na ma:/
T02TD3715E:130a-38: zhes pas shar gyi gling du bsam //
T02TD3715E:130a-39: aom ram dzam bu dv'i p'a ya na ma:zhes brjod pas lho'i gling chags par bsam /
T02TD3715E:130a-40: aom lam aa ba ra d'a n'i yan ma:zhes brjod pas nub kyi gling du chags par bsam /
T02TD3715E:130a-41: aom bam autta ra be na ma:zhes pas byang gi gling du chags pa'o //
T02TD3715E:130b-0: aom ya:au pa dv'i @130b p'a ya na ma:zhes pas shar lhor gzhag / aom ra:au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:zhes pas lho nub tu gzhag / aom la:au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:zhes pas nub byang du gzhag / aom ba:au pa dv'i p'a ya na ma:zhes byang shar du gzhag / aom ya:aa shva ratn'a ya na ma:zhes pas shar gyi gling du rta rin po chas gang bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:130b-1: aom ra:ma niratn'a ya na ma:zhes pas lhor nor bu rin po ches gang bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:130b-2: aom la:ha sti ratn'a yan ma:/
T02TD3715E:130b-3: zhes brjod pas byang du glang po chas gang bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:130b-4: aom ba:pu ru sha ratn'a ya na ma:zhes pas nub tu blon pos pos gang bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:130b-5: aom ya:khadga ratn'a ya na ma :zhes pas shar lhong dmag dpon gyis gang bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:130b-6: aom ra:str'i ratn'a ya na ma:zhes pas lho nub tu btsun mos gang bar bsam //
T02TD3715E:130b-7: aom la:tsa kra ratn'a ya na ma:zhes brjod pas nub byang du 'khro los gang bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:130b-8: aom ba sarba ni dhi bhyo na ma:zhes pas byang shar du gzhag pas rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:130b-9: aom ham aa dhi me ra be na:gu ru bhadt'a ra k'a ya ai dam mandal ma ni /
T02TD3715E:130b-10: zhes brjod pas dbus su bskar nas bzhag nas steng gi ri rab kyi khar padma'i gdan la bla ma sbyan drangs te mchod pa gzhan dang bcas pas dbul /
T02TD3715E:130b-11: mjug gang 'dod smon lam gdab pa dang /
T02TD3715E:130b-12: mandal bsdus pa'i me tog gtsang sar bskyal lo //
T02TD3715E:130b-13: dus kyi 'khor lo nas bstan pa'o //
T02TD3715E:130b-14: bla ma la dbul ba mu stegs dang thun mong ngo /
T02TD3715E:130b-15: mjug yon tan dran par bya ba ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdo nas /
T02TD3715E:130b-16: lci ba chu bcas sbyin pa ste /
T02TD3715E:130b-17: snyoms par byugs pa tshul khrims so //
T02TD3715E:130b-18: srog chags bsal ba bzod ba yin //
T02TD3715E:130b-19: mandal nyid la brtson pa dang //
T02TD3715E:130b-20: rtse gcig sems pa bsam gtan dang //
T02TD3715E:130b-21: phyogs mtshams 'byed pa shes rab drug / sangs rgyas sogs la 'di dbul bas //
T02TD3715E:130b-22: pha rol phyin drug thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3715E:130b-23: nad kun las grol gser mdog 'gyur //
T02TD3715E:130b-24: lha dang mis mchod zla ba bzhin 'bar mdangs //
T02TD3715E:130b-25: nor dang gser dang dbang phyug rgyal por skye //
T02TD3715E:130b-26: sangs rgyas gyur nas yongs su zhing khams dag / ces brjod pa'i yon tan dran par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:130b-27: nyin gung gi thun gyi chos spyod la lnga ste /
T02TD3715E:131a-3: glegs bam klag pa gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:131a-4: mandal mdzes pa bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:131a-7: bklag pa dngos la ltung ba thams cad sel bas phung po gsum pa bklag pa dang /
T02TD3715E:131a-8: shes rab 'phel bas brgyad stong pa dang ;
T02TD3715E:131a-11: yon tan dran par bya ba'o //
T02TD3715E:131a-12: gong ltar bdag gi dge ba'i las kyang bsngo ba yang bya'o //
T02TD3715E:131a-13: bskor ba byed pa la yang gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:131a-14: sbyor ba rten gyi rtsar phyin la shar nas phyag gsum bya /
T02TD3715E:131a-15: rang yi dam gyi lhar mos pa byas nas /
T02TD3715E:131a-16: aom a'a: h'um brjod pas h'um gis rten stong par sbyangs te /
T02TD3715E:131a-17: a'a:'i 'od kyis rang gi yi dam lha'i gdan padma dang nyi zla gang yin pa'i khar sa bon gsal ba las sku mdog rgyan bzhugs tshul gsal bar bskyed la /
T02TD3715E:131a-18: de nyid kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya /
T02TD3715E:131a-19: de'i snying po brjod cing snying po'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rten de la 'dus nas yod pa la /
T02TD3715E:131a-20: bskor ba dngos ma yengs par snying po de zlos shing bskor te /
T02TD3715E:131a-21: dngul byung na bzhag la mjug 'phro gcod kar spyan drangs pa rnams 'gro don la gshegs su gsol /
T02TD3715E:131a-22: skyed pa de rang la bsdus te mchod rten nam tsha tsha'am /
T02TD3715E:131a-23: glegs bam yin na de nyid du gyur nas gzhag go //
T02TD3715E:131a-26: gang dang gang gis gang 'tsho ba //
T02TD3715E:131a-27: 'tsho ba dag pa de btsal la //
T02TD3715E:131a-28: bkres dang skom sogs zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD3715E:131a-29: sman bzhin du ni bsam par bya //
T02TD3715E:131a-30: zhes pas ci tsam dgos pa g-yo sgyus ma btsal zhing /
T02TD3715E:131a-31: lus gso bar byed pa'i phyir dgos pa dang /
T02TD3715E:131a-32: de la gtor ma gtang ba ni snod gtsang mar zan dang /
T02TD3715E:131a-33: tshod ma dang spags pa ci yod las gcod de chus bkang la mdun drang por stegs la bzhag la rang yi dam gyi lhar gsal bas aom a'a:h'um brjod cing h'um gis stong bar bya /
T02TD3715E:131a-35: aom gyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur nas mgron bkug ste /
T02TD3715E:131a-36: aom a'a k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phad sv'ah'a /
T02TD3715E:131a-37: zhes lan gnyis brjod la gtang /
T02TD3715E:131b-1: aom sarba buddha bo dhi sa tva bhya: badzra nee bi dye h'um /
T02TD3715E:131b-2: zhes brjod la lha bshos dbul /
T02TD3715E:131b-3: aom ha ri te panytsa ga ta pu mah'a yaksha ni ha ra ha ra sarba p'a pam sarba aa si ni aa ti pandi krim sv'ah'a /
T02TD3715E:131b-5: 'phrog ma la chang bu spyin pa dang /
T02TD3715E:131b-6: aom aa gra pandi aa si bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02TD3715E:131b-7: zhes brjod la phud kyi chang bu sbyin no //
T02TD3715E:131b-9: aom a'a:h'um brjod pas dug thams cad dang bral te bdud rtsir bsam /
T02TD3715E:131b-10: g-yas pa'i srin lag gis reg pas dug thams cad zhi bar bsam /
T02TD3715E:131b-11: de nas ci rigs par bza'o //
T02TD3715E:131b-12: aom au tsishta pandi aa si bhya:sv'ah'a /
T02TD3715E:131b-13: zhes pas lhag ma bcang la sbyin no //
T02TD3715E:131b-14: gzhan lhag med par bcang ngo //
T02TD3715E:131b-16: yon tan zla ba grags pa'i mdo nas /
T02TD3715E:131b-17: gtor ma gtang zhing bshos gtsang phul //
T02TD3715E:131b-18: 'phrog ma phud kyi chang bu dang //
T02TD3715E:131b-19: lnga pa lhag ma'i chang bu yis //
T02TD3715E:131b-22: bdag la lan chags mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir kha bshal te /
T02TD3715E:131b-23: gang gis sbyin dang gang la sbyin //
T02TD3715E:131b-24: sbyin pa ji ltar mi dmigs pa //
T02TD3715E:131b-25: sbyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa yis //
T02TD3715E:131b-26: sbyin bdag de la yongs rdzogs shog / ces smon lam gdab po //
T02TD3715E:131b-27: de yang sangs rgyas la sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos chos ston drangs la sangs rgyas skyengs par bya bar 'dod pa la /
T02TD3715E:131b-28: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD3715E:131b-29: dngos su 'khor gsum sbyin bdag zas len pa po gsum sgyu ma dang 'dra ste /
T02TD3715E:131b-30: sgyu ma'i nus pa yod pas smon pa'o //
T02TD3715E:131b-31: tsha tsha la yang gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:131b-32: sbyor ba ni dang po sa dad /
T02TD3715E:131b-36: ji tsam 'debs pa'i 'dag pa dris btab la /
T02TD3715E:131b-37: mdun du khri la gzhag ste /
T02TD3715E:131b-38: rang yi dam gyi lhar mos pas aom a'a:h'um /
T02TD3715E:131b-42: 'khor lo'i lte ba la aa las zla ba /
T02TD3715E:131b-43: zla ba'i steng na aom yod pa de'i 'od kyis snang khyab ste /
T02TD3715E:131b-44: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs dam bskul /
T02TD3715E:131b-45: sems can gyi sgrib pa sbyangs te slar 'dus nas aom shin tu gsal ba las rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
T02TD3715E:131b-46: 'khor lo dang zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD3715E:132a-1: rgyan gyis brgyan pa bskyed de gsal ba dang /
T02TD3715E:132a-2: de'i thugs ka'i padma dang zla ba'i steng na aom las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bkug ste mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la yon chab la sogs pas mchod nas bskyed pa dang /
T02TD3715E:132a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo bdud rtsi'i ngo bo dkar ba 'od dang bcas pa gyur bar bsam mo //
T02TD3715E:132a-5: de nas na mo bha ga ba te /
T02TD3715E:132a-6: bee ro tsa na bra bha r'a dz'a ya /
T02TD3715E:132a-8: aarha te samya ksam buddh'a ya /
T02TD3715E:132a-21: sarba ta th'a ga hri da ya /
T02TD3715E:132a-24: zhes nyi shu rtsa gcig pa bzlas la gdab ste /
T02TD3715E:132a-25: lag pas len tsa na 'od kyi gong bu aom dang ldan pa blangs te sku par du bcug la /
T02TD3715E:132a-26: gong gi sngags kyis btab la rnam par snang mdzad du 'byung ngo //
T02TD3715E:132a-27: mjug / aom ye dharm'a he tu pra bh'a ba he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dta /
T02TD3715E:132a-28: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i mah'a shra ma na ye sv'ah'a /
T02TD3715E:132a-29: zhes lan bdun brjod pas rab gnas su 'gyur ro //
T02TD3715E:132a-30: me tog la bzlas te tsha tsha la gtor bas skad cig la rnam par snang mdzad grangs med du gyur /
T02TD3715E:132a-31: de'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bkug ste sngon bzhin dngos sam blos mchod nas tsha tshar gyur pa'o //
T02TD3715E:132a-32: gcig byas pas bye ba snyed kyi bsod nams 'thob po //
T02TD3715E:132a-33: ngal ba gso ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:132a-34: sbyor ba lus dal bar bsdad //
T02TD3715E:132a-35: dngos chos spyod pa'i rgyal po dang /
T02TD3715E:132a-38: slob dpon gyi che ba brjod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:132a-40: dge ba byas pa'i yon tan dran par bya /
T02TD3715E:132a-41: mjug rgyu 'bras theg pa chen po'i mdo blta'o //
T02TD3715E:132a-43: gong bzhin du thun glegs bam klag pa dang /
T02TD3715E:132a-45: gtsug tor la sogs pa'i mdo gdon pa'o //
T02TD3715E:132a-46: srod kyi thun la lnga ste /
T02TD3715E:132a-47: gong bzhin du khrus bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:132a-49: mandal dang mchod pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD3715E:132a-50: bsam gtan bya ba dang nyal pa'o //
T02TD3715E:132b-0: sbyor ba khams dang sbyar la bsam gtan bsdu ba @132b dang ;
T02TD3715E:132b-1: glo g-yas phab la nyal ba dngos dang nang par snga bar ldang sems kyis gnyid kyi bsam gtan la 'jug pa'o //
T02TD3715E:132b-2: bye brag pa'i lta ba la yang gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:132b-3: nub phyogs bye brag tu smra ba'i nyan thos tha ma dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-4: 'bring gnyis kyi ltab chos kyi bdag dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-6: chos kyi bdag phyi'i yul dkar dmar /
T02TD3715E:132b-10: 'jam rtsub sna tshogs su snang ba 'di rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i ngo bo g-yag rnga dang ne gsing ltar 'dod cing /
T02TD3715E:132b-11: dge sdig gi rgyu 'bras kyang yul can rjes su 'dod la /
T02TD3715E:132b-12: de yang rkyen gyis mi rtag skad cig mas rtag par snang ste /
T02TD3715E:132b-13: bum pa la sogs pa dbyug pas 'jig par dngos su snang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-14: sdom rdzas can yul can yin pas nyams na rdza chag pa dang 'dra ba dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-15: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-17: sdig pa yang de bzhin du 'dod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:132b-18: gang zag gi bdag phung po gsum par 'dod de /
T02TD3715E:132b-19: bdag btsal bas mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du med la /
T02TD3715E:132b-20: bde sdug nyams su myong bas yod pa yang min med pa yang min par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:132b-25: skyon ni 'khor bar sdug bsngal ba'o //
T02TD3715E:132b-26: de yang bdag tu mthong bas 'gro ba bzang mo la chags pa nyes so //
T02TD3715E:132b-27: bsgom thabs bdag zhi bar mgo nas rkang pa'i bar bdag med par mi gtsang bar mthong /
T02TD3715E:132b-28: bsgoms pas 'bras bu sems de zhi nas dgra bcom par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:132b-29: skyon rtag pa dang chad par phyi nang 'dod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-30: lus gtsang ba dang nyon mongs pa la chags na'o //
T02TD3715E:132b-31: nyan thos 'bring gi bsgom pa la yang gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:132b-32: ma bsgoms par rtogs pas 'khor sdug bsngal lo //
T02TD3715E:132b-33: de yang rlung phyir shor bas rtog pa 'byung bas bdag tu brtags pas nyon mongs pa la chags pas nyes thabs rlung 'dzin pa ste gsum /
T02TD3715E:132b-34: bgrang rlung gcig nas bcu dang brgya dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-35: stong khri 'bum gyi bar du bgrangs te /
T02TD3715E:132b-36: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes pa dag par 'dod /
T02TD3715E:132b-37: bsdams nas re re bgrangs pas bdag phung po gsum par 'dod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:132b-38: kha dog la slob pa dang /
T02TD3715E:133a-1: 'byung nang du 'ong ba gnyis drag zhan blo'i gnas bzang nas 'bras bu lhag bcas lhag med de las 'byung bar 'dod do //
T02TD3715E:133a-2: dbyibs la slob pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02TD3715E:133a-6: rtse gcig pa sna'i rtse mo nas sor bzhi nas /
T02TD3715E:133a-7: dpag tshad tsam du phyir bsring zhing /
T02TD3715E:133a-8: sna'i tshang tshing nas lte bar bskyil ba'o //
T02TD3715E:133a-9: rtse gsum pa phar la snga sgo gnyis nas spro ba tshur la sna rtser bsdus te gong bzhin bsring /
T02TD3715E:133a-11: autpa la sna rtse nas 'phro la phar la yul gang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:133a-12: nang du bum par bkang bas lhag bcas lhag med kyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133a-13: skyon mi gtsang ba sgom pa dang /
T02TD3715E:133a-14: bum pa ltar 'gags nas sems med pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133a-15: nyan thos rab dang rang sangs rgyas /
T02TD3715E:133a-16: kha che bye brag tu smra ba ste /
T02TD3715E:133a-17: chos kyi bdag tha ma dang mthun no //
T02TD3715E:133a-18: gang zag gi bdag med par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133a-19: des bsgom pa yang bden bzhi bsgom /
T02TD3715E:133a-20: de yang las kyi 'byung pa'i mdo las /
T02TD3715E:133a-21: sdug bsngal 'di brgyad phung po la //
T02TD3715E:133a-22: phung por chags pas dug lnga yin //
T02TD3715E:133a-23: zhes pas rgyu kun du ge lnga spong ba dang /
T02TD3715E:133a-24: 'bras bu sdug bsngal lus la gnod par shes pas las la mi chags shing bdag med pa dang /
T02TD3715E:133a-25: ye shes dang byams pa dang mi gtsang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:133a-26: bdag med du lhag gis mthong la /
T02TD3715E:133a-27: bdag med pa'i stong pa de bsgom pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133a-28: de yang gong gi lus ngag yid kyi dge ba dang bsdoms pas sngon gyi sgrib pa bdag la bdag med pa stong pa la bzhag pas dgra bcom pa thob pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133a-29: skyon gang zag gi bdag 'dod pa spang ba'o //
T02TD3715E:133a-30: theg pa chen po'i sdom pa la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:133a-31: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang //
T02TD3715E:133a-32: sngags kyi dam tshig gnyis so //
T02TD3715E:133a-33: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la bzhi ste /
T02TD3715E:133a-37: spyod lam la gnyis te rten dang spyod lam dngos so //
T02TD3715E:133a-44: spyod lam dngos la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:133b-0: de yang spyod lam khyad par med par dus gsum du lnga @133b char 'dod la lta ba la khyad yod de /
T02TD3715E:133b-1: sbyor dngos mjug gsum mdo sde pas rten 'brel du 'dod la /
T02TD3715E:133b-2: rnam bcas sems kyi rnam par 'dod //
T02TD3715E:133b-3: rnam med pas bzang rtog tu 'dod la /
T02TD3715E:133b-4: sgyu ma lta bus sgyu ma lta bur 'dod /
T02TD3715E:133b-5: rab tu mi gnas pas kun rdzob ba yin gyi don dam ma yin te rmi lam lta bu mi bden par snang bar 'dod de /
T02TD3715E:133b-6: don dam la khas len med pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133b-8: spyod lam dngos kyi sbyor ba la dgu ste /
T02TD3715E:133b-19: mchod dang bstod dang phyag 'tshal dang //
T02TD3715E:133b-20: skyabs dang sdig bshags yi rang dang //
T02TD3715E:133b-21: bskul dang gsol ba gdab pa dang //
T02TD3715E:133b-22: bsngo dang dgu bo sbyor bar bstan //
T02TD3715E:133b-23: zhes dri ma med pa'i mdo nas bstan to //
T02TD3715E:133b-24: mchod pa la gsum ste gnas dang /
T02TD3715E:133b-25: rten dang mchod pa dngos so //
T02TD3715E:133b-27: byin gyis brlabs pa lha khang la sogs pa nyams dga' bar rten byang chub chen po dang /
T02TD3715E:133b-29: mkhan po la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:133b-30: mchod pa dngos la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:133b-33: mchod pa bya ba la rten phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133b-34: mchod byed pa dag dgos pa de rnams mnyes pa /
T02TD3715E:133b-35: de la dgos pa mchod pa yin /
T02TD3715E:133b-36: de'i dgos pa bdag gzhan don grub pa'o //
T02TD3715E:133b-37: mchod pa dang yon 'byor na dngos /
T02TD3715E:133b-38: ma 'byor na bskal bzang ltar me tog spor gang la brten te slob dpon dang /
T02TD3715E:133b-39: yid kyis gzhan na yod pa'i dngos po lus sems su bcas pa dbul te /
T02TD3715E:133b-40: mchod pa rnam pa bdun gyis mchod de /
T02TD3715E:133b-41: chu gtsang gis sku bsil zhing ras bzangs kyis sku byi dor bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:133b-42: me tog mand'a ra la sogs pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD3715E:133b-43: sil snyen gyis mchod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:133b-48: rgya spos la sogs pa'i dud pas mchod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:133b-50: mar me'i phreng ba gcig gam /
T02TD3715E:133b-51: bcu'am brgya stong dbul ba dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-1: sogs pa'i dri'i byug pa bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-14: nyo ti la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-18: be la shal sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-19: khur ba dang la du la sogs pas mchod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-20: dung la sogs pa sil snyan dang dbyangs kyi rim pas mchod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:134a-21: yon la rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-22: bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-28: lteng ka la sogs pa gzugs sgra'i bye brag ji snyed pa blo dang dngos su 'byor ba dbul lo //
T02TD3715E:134a-29: 'brel ba nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo nas /
T02TD3715E:134a-30: sems gnyis bskyed nas sangs rgyas mchod //
T02TD3715E:134a-31: mchod pa yon dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD3715E:134a-32: rgyal dang de yi sras mnyes nas //
T02TD3715E:134a-35: bstod pa yang rten gong ltar bstod byed dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-36: dgos pa mnyes pa dang de la dgos pa /
T02TD3715E:134a-37: phyogs dus kun gyi sangs rgyas sras //
T02TD3715E:134a-38: gang dag 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD3715E:134a-40: sku yi mtshan ldan rnams la bstod //
T02TD3715E:134a-41: byams pa'i thugs ldan rnams la bstod //
T02TD3715E:134a-42: ces theg pa chen po'i mdo nas sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD3715E:134a-43: byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa nyid kyis bstod do //
T02TD3715E:134a-44: 'brel bas kun nas brjod pas so //
T02TD3715E:134a-45: phyag 'tshal ba la yang gong ltar drug gis theg pa chen po nas phyag 'tshal ba gsum mam /
T02TD3715E:134a-46: bdun nas stong dang khri'i bar du 'tshal ba'o //
T02TD3715E:134a-47: skyabs dngos dang dbye ba gnyis las /
T02TD3715E:134a-49: skyabs sngon gyi sbyor ba rnams shes nas /
T02TD3715E:134a-51: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD3715E:134a-52: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3715E:134a-53: zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba chen po'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3715E:134b-0: kun la skyob par mdzad pa'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i @134b byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD3715E:134b-4: rten skyabs su mchi ba nyan thos ltar /
T02TD3715E:134b-6: yid theg pa chen po'i chos dang gzhan dag la dad pa'o //
T02TD3715E:134b-7: sbyor ba lus ngag yid gong ltar dang /
T02TD3715E:134b-11: sangs rgyas sprul skur shes pa /
T02TD3715E:134b-12: chos shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD3715E:134b-13: dag 'dun 'jam dpal la sogs par shes par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:134b-15: dus mtha' thug pa med pa'am /
T02TD3715E:134b-17: yon tan 'khor ba las thar pa dang /
T02TD3715E:134b-19: spyod pa la 'jug pa nas khyed kyi thugs rjes su bzung bas na /
T02TD3715E:134b-20: srid la mi 'jigs sems can phan pa bgyi //
T02TD3715E:134b-22: mi nyams pa bya ba la gong ma'i 'jig rten gyi spangs pa'i steng du gzhan don bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:134b-23: srog gcod pa spangs nas gzhan la mi 'tshe ba dang /
T02TD3715E:134b-24: mu stegs dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mi 'grogs pa'o //
T02TD3715E:134b-25: sdig pa bshags pa rten dang /
T02TD3715E:134b-27: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02TD3715E:134b-29: shin tu ma rig sdig pa'i las //
T02TD3715E:134b-30: sna tshogs bgyis dang bgyid du stsal //
T02TD3715E:134b-31: rjes su yi rang bgyis pa bshags //
T02TD3715E:134b-33: mdo gzhan nas bstan pa ltar bshags so //
T02TD3715E:134b-34: yi rang ba'i rim pa mdo gzhan ltar yang bya /
T02TD3715E:134b-36: skye bo rnams kyis dge spyad dang //
T02TD3715E:134b-37: de yi stobs kyis bde 'gyur la'ang //
T02TD3715E:134b-38: bdag ni shin tu yi rang ngo //
T02TD3715E:134b-39: nyan thos rang rgyal dge ba dang //
T02TD3715E:134b-40: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la'ang //
T02TD3715E:134b-41: nges par di ring yi rang ngo //
T02TD3715E:134b-42: sangs rgyas mdzad pa gang byung dang //
T02TD3715E:134b-43: sems can bde la yi rang ngo //
T02TD3715E:134b-45: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems //
T02TD3715E:134b-46: de dag tshogs la bdag bskul na //
T02TD3715E:134b-47: sems can rang dgar mi gtong bar //
T02TD3715E:134b-50: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD3715E:134b-51: byang chub sems dpa' 'don mdzad la //
T02TD3715E:134b-52: sems can bde la ma bkod par //
T02TD3715E:134b-53: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
T02TD3715E:134b-54: de rnams kyi dge ba bsngo ba //
T02TD3715E:135a-1: gis de ltar dge spyad pas //
T02TD3715E:135a-2: nam mkha' khyab pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD3715E:135a-3: dge ba 'di yi byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD3715E:135a-4: pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin nas //
T02TD3715E:135a-5: thams cad byang chub chen por shog / gal te byang chub ma thob par //
T02TD3715E:135a-6: theg chen chos la spyod pa dang //
T02TD3715E:135a-8: 'gro rnams myur du sgrol ba shog / mdo gzhan ltar yang gdab bo //
T02TD3715E:135a-11: smon pa ni slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
T02TD3715E:135a-12: bdag ming 'di zhes ba gyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo //
T02TD3715E:135a-14: sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba rnams la ji ltar phan pa de ltar bdag kyang phan par bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD3715E:135a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-19: tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-20: bzod pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-21: brtson 'grus las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-22: bsam gtan las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-23: shes rab las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyis sems can ma grol ba thams cad grol bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-24: ma bsgral ba thams cad bsgral bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-25: dbugs ma phyin pa thams cad dbugs phyin par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-26: mya ngan las ma 'das pa thams cad mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa de bzhin du /
T02TD3715E:135a-27: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung nas /
T02TD3715E:135a-28: nam snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du bdag gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-29: tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-30: bzod pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-31: brtson 'grus las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135a-32: bsam gtan las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-0: shes rab las byung ba'i dge ba ji snyed bgyid pa de snyed kyis sems can ma grol ba @135b thams cad dgrol bar bgyi'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-1: ma rgal ba thams cad bsgral bar bgyi'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-2: dbugs ma phyin pa thams cad dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-3: mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-5: gal te sdom pa las nyams na slar gso bas gnang du gsol zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD3715E:135b-6: mjug gi don shes par bya ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:135b-7: dgos pa shes par bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-12: sbyor ba la mchod pa la sogs ba dgu las skye bas dgu dgos par shes pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-13: rten gzhan dang bdag nyid las /
T02TD3715E:135b-14: gzhan la rten dbang dang po gnyis /
T02TD3715E:135b-15: dbang po sdom pa la gnas pa mkhas pa'i slob dpon las skye bar shes pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-16: yi dam dang dbang po las skye ba'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-17: rten byang chub chen po la sogs pa'i mchog gsum las skye'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-18: bdag las skye ba gang gi nyan thos kyi ltar khyad par du 'phags pa drug dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-19: phan sems yod pa nus pa dang ldan pa las skye bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-20: thob par shes pa la bcu ste /
T02TD3715E:135b-27: sems can byang chub la dgod pa'i bsam pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-28: mi ldog pa'i bsam pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-29: blangs pa'i dus de nyid nas yid ches pas thob pa'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-30: mi nyams par bya ba la gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:135b-34: shes par bya ba la lnga ste /
T02TD3715E:135b-36: rten gyi khyad par gyis bslab pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-39: sdom pa gsum ldan du shes par bya ba'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-40: ngo bo smon 'jug gnyis las smon pa'i ngo bo dang /
T02TD3715E:135b-42: de yang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas ngo bo yang dag par blangs pa'i sems pa dge ba rgyun chags 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba'o //
T02TD3715E:135b-46: khas blang pa bzhi las dang ba'i dad pa gzhan don gyis bdag grol bar shes pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-1: la snying rje skyes pas gzhan don la mos pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136a-2: mos pa skyes nas rgyun sa bcu man chad du yin dgos pas smon pa'i dge ba'i rgyun sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas smon pa sems can sangs rgyas su 'dod la /
T02TD3715E:136a-5: 'dun pa sa bdun 'jug pa'i gzhi byed pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-6: lhag pa'i bsam pa zla ba tshes pa lta bu dge ba 'phel ba dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-7: sbyor ba me lta bu dngos po thams cad bsreg pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-8: bsam pa bzang po gser lta bu sems mi nyams pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-9: skyob pa ma lta bu nyes pas mi gos pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-10: 'brel ba rgyu 'bras lta bu thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-11: myur ba thog lta bu sa la spyod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136a-12: 'jug pa'i ngo bo de yang ngo tsha shes pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-13: khrel yod pas yang dag par blangs pa'i sems pa dge ba rgyun chags rgyu la dam 'cha' ba'i ngo bo ste /
T02TD3715E:136a-15: yid ches pa'i dad pa sangs rgyas gzhan don las 'byung bas gzhan la snying rje skyes te /
T02TD3715E:136a-16: sangs ma rgyas bar du 'phro mi gcod pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-17: gzhan don byed pas gzhan don khas blangs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-18: bdag gzhan sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i sdig pa spong ba so sor thar pa'i bslab pa dge ba chos bsdus pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa /
T02TD3715E:136a-19: sems can don byed de gnyis sems can don du spyod la stobs gar cher de yang 'byed pa dang phye zhing spyod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136a-20: de yang sangs ma rgyas par du sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i rgyu spyod par khas len pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136a-22: sems can thams cad sngon 'brel gyi bur shes nas byams par bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-23: ma chags pas 'dod pa chos nor sbyin pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-24: chos thams cad bdag med pas rang la 'dod pa med ba dang /
T02TD3715E:136a-25: sangs rgyas gzhan don las 'byung bas rgyu 'bras mi dgag pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136a-26: rten gyi khyad par gyis bslab pa'i rim pa shes par bya ba la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:136a-27: rten dang bslab pa'i chos so //
T02TD3715E:136a-29: 'dod pa chung ba dang che ba'o //
T02TD3715E:136a-30: che ba la yang gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:136a-33: bslab pa'i rim pa la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:136a-35: smon pa la yang gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:136b-0: btags pa ni gong gi @136b ming dang zhes pa'i rten tsam yang skye la /
T02TD3715E:136b-1: dngos thob nas ngo bo dang ldan par bsrung ba'i las dang po'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-3: btags pa ba las dang po ba de la yang yod de /
T02TD3715E:136b-4: dngos po bdag pa la yod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-5: las dang po pa'i bslab bya la gsum /
T02TD3715E:136b-7: sbyor ba sngon du song bas mos pa /
T02TD3715E:136b-8: smon pas gsum la skyabs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-9: dbang po shes nas gnas tshol ba dang bsam pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-10: bsam pa bdag la sems pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-12: bdag la sems pa la gzhi ste /
T02TD3715E:136b-13: bdag gi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-14: dgos pa lus ngag gi dge ba byas dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-18: longs spyod kyis tshogs bsags pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-19: gzhan sems pa la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:136b-21: snying rje chos dmigs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-23: bzod pa sdug bsngal dang du len pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-24: sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-25: lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug smon nas spyod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-26: 'bras bu skye ba la dbang ba dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-30: sems can gyi don byed pa la dbang ba lnga'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-31: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i las dang po'i bslab bya la yang gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:136b-32: gzhi sbyor ba sngon du song bas skyabs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-34: bsam pa 'jug pa'i sems kyis gong bzhin 'dod pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-35: bsam pa gzhan la sems pa kho na ste /
T02TD3715E:136b-36: snying rje dang bzod pa la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:136b-37: snying rje la yang gang zag la dmigs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-38: chos la dmigs pa dang dmigs pa med pa gsum ste /
T02TD3715E:136b-39: gang zag la dmigs pa ni mu stegs dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-40: nyan thos dang thun mong ste /
T02TD3715E:136b-41: sems can rkyen gyis sdug bsngal ba la skye ba'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-42: chos la dmigs pa ni sems tsam ste /
T02TD3715E:136b-43: chos nyid ma rtogs pas lon te rtogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-44: dmigs pa med pa dbu ma ste /
T02TD3715E:136b-45: sdug bsngal ba chos nyid ma rtogs pa la snying rje bskyed pa'i dus na rab tu mi gnas par shes pas gsum bsdus pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-46: bzod pa gzhan don du sdug bsngal phra mo la son zhing dang du len pa'o //
T02TD3715E:136b-47: goms nas che bas mi gnod la ji mi snyam pa dang /
T02TD3715E:136b-48: bzod pa de dang mi bzod pa rab tu mi gnas par brjod pa gsum ka bsgom ba'o //
T02TD3715E:137a-0: @137a * // lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzhan don du rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD3715E:137a-1: 'bras bu re ba med pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-3: dus la 'dod pa chung ba'i mtha' med pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-4: chen po'i rgyu bskyed pa'i dus blangs ma thog dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-5: lam sgrub pa snying po byang chub thob pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-6: sangs rgyas pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med gsum pa'o //
T02TD3715E:137a-8: zla pa yar ngo la sems bskyed thob pa rnams byams pa la sogs pa ltar bram ze las sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-9: mar ngo las thob pa rnams sh'akya thub pa la sogs ba ltar rgyal rigs las sangs rgyas pa'o//
T02TD3715E:137a-10: gsum dang ldan par shes par bya ba la gnyis te /
T02TD3715E:137a-13: ldan lugs la nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo nas /
T02TD3715E:137a-14: chos dang gang zag gcig nyid sems //
T02TD3715E:137a-15: smon dang 'jug dang so sor thar //
T02TD3715E:137a-16: rig pa sbyor bas gzhan gyi don //
T02TD3715E:137a-17: nus na gong nas gong du 'gyur //
T02TD3715E:137a-19: gong gi so sor thar ba'i bslab pa rigs bdun gyi bye brag de rang gi sems yin pas 'og ma'i nyan thos ma spangs par theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang yin la /
T02TD3715E:137a-20: de yang sems kyi snang ba phung po dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-22: skye mched rgyud ltar lhar gnas pa'o //
T02TD3715E:137a-23: de yang sngags kyi dam tshig ni /
T02TD3715E:137a-24: bdag dang dgos pa lhar gnas pa mthong bas lha dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-25: lha mi gnod pas nyan thos ltar nyes pa spong ba dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-26: lha ma yin gzhan gyis ma rtogs pas byang chub sems dpa' ltar phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-27: de ltar sems su 'dus pa'i don la sems can rnams shin tu 'khrul nas sems rab tu mi gnas par ma shes shing bdag tu bzung ba la dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skyes /
T02TD3715E:137a-28: so sor thar pa'i bslab pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-29: dam tshig spyod pa dag la dmigs ba med pas smon 'jug gzhan don du byed pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-30: de yang sngags kyis lhar snang ba thams cad sems kyi 'phrul par snang bas nyan thos bye brag tu spyod la /
T02TD3715E:137a-31: bye brag ma 'gags na nus pa so sor 'byung bas byang chub sems dpa' ltar 'dogs pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137a-32: de ltar sems kyi rgyun la brten nas sku bzhi 'byung bas /
T02TD3715E:137b-0: 'gro ba 'dren pa'i snang ba @137b ltar so sor thar pa'i bslab pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang /
T02TD3715E:137b-2: sngags kyi dam tshig dang gsum ldan pa'o //
T02TD3715E:137b-3: sku bzhi nus pa so so nas snang zhing chos skur 'dus shing 'byung ba bzhin sdom pa yar ldan du 'gyur te /
T02TD3715E:137b-4: so sor thar ba byang chub sems dpar 'gyur //
T02TD3715E:137b-6: de so sor snang ba yang btub pa bzhin no //
T02TD3715E:137b-7: nges pa bskyed pa yang bzhi ste /
T02TD3715E:137b-12: gzhi ma nyams pa slob dpon la la dag rten dang brten par sdom pa gsum min par 'dod /
T02TD3715E:137b-14: ka bas gdung dang 'og gis steng khang bteg pa ltar ma yin zer ba mi rigs te /
T02TD3715E:137b-15: sdom pa yar ldan du gnas gyur pas sa bon gyi dus na sa bon ma nyams /
